name: The Leaky Tap [TriJam 193]
description:
The Leal Tap

This was designed for the TriJam 193 for the Theme of Patience.

Instructions

Catch the drips, but if fail once you lose all. To record a time turn the tap off. The game will require patience to get a high score or face the wrath of insults for failing.

Credits

All art, animations, and design by Stealthness

Music from Vertex Studio

Ambient Sound: Light rain in the suburbs [link]

Font by FONTRIX [link]
